introduction: At a lonely place in the suburbs of Tokyo, a man collapsed and died from a heart attack. He was Shinya Yamaguchi, a secondhand-book seller on the net. He loved literary works of Tamiki Hara and Yuji Kinoshita. After his death his wife, Ayako, met him in her dream, read notebooks he left and sometimes felt him beside her. A year passed. Around her there are her friend, Yuki Sasaki who stays in Hokkaido for the time being, Kohei Kawamura who is Yuki’s boyfriend, Nobuyo and Sho, Shinya’s mother and uterine brother. Sho, preparing for entrance examinations to the University of Art, has some feelings for Ayako.
